A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One word:  Disaster.  I suspect Rian Johnson to secretely hate Star Wars or to work for WB or to be a Sith.  The choices made are so so wrong. We were all waiting to be surprised. We've been surprised to deeply dislike the movie.   This appart special effects are outstanding. Carrie Fisher and Mark Hamill are outstanding. Poe is the only character which seems right in it. Part of Rey and Kylo are ok. But only parts and that's not ok.  I'm mad and I'm sad.
